body:
Hey, Craft_Sem here.
 I'm sorry for everything that happened on the forums lately . I've acted like a complete dick, and I know a lot of you guys hate me for that. I can completely understand that. I'm trying to change to a better person. Again, sorry.  (I probaly made some mistakes lol) ^^-^^


(pand and mooch, no worries.)

replies.body:
.... You can't kill your own router..

It would send all packages of data instantly to my network card, from my network card, if I really DoS'ed myself, because it wasn't a DDoS attack.

And I wasn't (D)DoS'ing anyone.

(n-card > n-card) 127.0.0.1:XXXXX DoS'ed 127.0.0.1:XXXXX

not (n-card > router > n-card) 192.168.178.XX(X) DoS'ed 192.168.178.XX(X) (In this mode, the DoS attack will go through your router. (My router is very strong so nobody could kill it c;)

I'm not 100% sure if this is true what I wrote...
but plz. no ddos yo.

#sunset
